item.description:
It's that time of year again!  Join us for reggae, calypso, dancing, drinks, and burgers.

Surfside5 Bar & Grill has a huge oceanfront deck featuring a great reggae band, Hot Like Fire. 

Hot Like Fire @ Surfside 5 is loud, crowded, and a lot of fun. There's a grill and dancing right on the deck overlooking the ocean.

Cover Charge: $10 (And it's worth it!)

Directions: Follow Route 1A north or south until you get to the middle of Salisbury beach and turn east toward the ocean. You'll know you're in the right place when you see lots of neon and tattoos! Try to park legally and walk up toward the bar.

-Catch reggae fever with New England's most sought after reggae and calypso party band. People are always dancin' when Hot Like Fire is jammin'. Every Sunday on SurfSide5’s giant oceanfront deck!
item.how_to_find_us: Corona in one hand, burger in the other!
item.name: Surfside5 Reggae - Hot Like Fire!
